verses.text: PEA fai atu ‘e Siope, ‘o ne ofa‘aki ‘ene ta‘anga, ‘o ne pehē:
Tangi ‘a e mo‘ui ‘a ‘Ela, ‘A ia kuo ne to‘o ‘eku malu fakalao; Pea tangi ‘a e mo‘ui ‘a Sātai, ‘A ia kuo ne fakakona ‘eku mo‘ui;
Kae lolotonga ‘oku ‘iate au ‘eku mānava, Mo e ‘i hoku ava‘i ihu ‘a e hō ‘a ‘Elohā;
‘Ilo ‘e au kapau ‘e lea kovi ‘e hoku loungutu, Pe lau kākā ‘e hoku ‘elelo ni.
Molekemama‘o ha‘aku fakatonuhia kimoutolu; ‘E ‘ikai te u tukuange ‘eku mā‘oni‘oni ‘o a‘u ki he mate.
Ko ‘eku totonu ni te u puke ki ai, ‘o ‘ikai te u momo‘i fakamalūlū ange; ‘Oku ‘ikai haku ‘aho ‘e taha ‘oku tautea ai au ‘e hoku loto.
Ko hoku fili pē ‘e hā ko e angahala, Pea ko ia ‘oku ne tu‘u kiate au ‘e hā ko e mamio.
He ko e hā ‘a e falala‘anga ‘o e angahala fufū ‘oka tu‘usi ia? ‘Oka unuhi ‘e ‘Elohā hono laumālie?
‘E ongo‘i koā ‘e ‘Ela ‘ene tautapa, ‘Oka falala kiate ia ‘a e faingata‘a?
Te ne lava ke felātani mo Sātai? Te ne lava ke ui kia ‘Elohā he taimi kotoa pē?
Te u fakahā kiate kimoutolu ‘a e anga ‘o e fai ‘a ‘Ela: ‘E ‘ikai te u fufū ‘a e me‘a ‘oku taka ‘ia Sātai.
Seuke, kuo mou sio ki ai ‘e kimoutolu kotoa: Pea tū ko e fai ai ho‘omou fakamuna, ko e hā?
Ko eni ‘a e tofi‘a meia ‘Ela ‘o e tangata angahala, Mo e ‘inasi ‘o e kau fakamālohi ‘oku nau ma‘u meia Sātai.
Kapau ‘oku tokolahi ‘ene fānau, ‘oku ma‘a e heletā pē; Pea ‘oku ‘ikai mākona hono pikilau ‘i he me‘akai.
Ko hono toenga ‘oku tanu ‘e he mahaki faka‘auha, Pea ‘oku ‘ikai fai ha tēngihia ‘e hono kau uitou,
Neongo ‘ene fokotu‘u noa ‘a e siliva hangē ko e efu, Pea tokonaki kofu hangē ha te‘etanu;
‘Oku ne tokonaki pē, ka ‘oku kofu ‘aki ‘e he mā‘oni‘oni, Pea ko e siliva ‘e tufa ‘e he kau ‘ata‘atā.
‘Oku ne langa fakamū hono fale, Pea hangē ha palepale ‘oku ngaohi ‘e he tauhi ngoue.
‘Oku ne tokoto koloa‘ia, ka ‘oku ‘ikai ke toe fai: Ka ofo hake–‘oku ‘ikai.
‘Oku a‘u mai ki ai ‘a e ngaahi ilifia hangē ko e lōmaki, ‘Oku lami‘i po‘uli ia ‘e he ‘ahiohio.
‘Oku hiki ‘e he matangi hahake, pea ‘oku ne ‘alu, Pea ‘oku ne fakapuna ia mei he potu na‘a ne ‘i ai.
‘Io, ‘oku tukuna atu ki ai ‘e he ‘Afio ta‘eha‘ane mamae; ‘Oku ne mātu‘aki feinga ke hola mei hono nima.
‘Oku nau pasipasi nima ki ai, ‘O sese‘e ia mei hono potu.
